name: Polly (alpha)
description:
Vision

Polly (working title) is a game about a little ghost bound to this earthly realm. Explore the castle's puzzles and stories in order to find a way to ascend.

This project is currently in early development and is still finding its way. Playing and giving feedback will help me achieve the best version of what I want to create.

I envision a cozy, whimsical, morbid world where you'll navigate through puzzles and explore the strange corners of a castle.

So far I've been focusing on finding an art style and getting some mechanics in place. The demo is rather linear and simplistic, but I hope you can envision what's to come.

If you enjoy the experience I hope you may consider donating. Even a little helps a huge deal and would encourage me immensely!

Controls

Controller:
A: movement boost
R1: grab object
Left joy: movement

Keyboard:
Arrow keys to move
Ctrl: grab
Shift: movement boost
